text: "Last Dance/The Hustle/On The Radio" (or the Disco Medley) is a medley by American singer Selena. The medley had sampled the songs the "Last Dance", "The Hustle" and "On The Radio" by Donna Summer. The Mexican release had "Viviras Selena" (a tribute/various artists song) which was written by Pete Astudillo. == Charts == Chart (1997) Peak position U.S. Billboard Hot Latin Tracks 25 U.S. Billboard Latin Regional Mexican Airplay 27 Category:Selena songs Category:1997 songs
title: Last Dance/The Hustle/On the Radio
